links.title: Sarepta Therapeutics Posts Mixed Third Quarter As Sales Miss
links.description: Sarepta Therapeutics ( SRPT) reported third-quarter losses of $1.42 per share on $121.4 million in sales late Thursday. But SRPT stock was flat in extended trades. Analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research expected Sarepta to lose $1.89 per share and to report $131 million in sales.

messages.body: $SRPT misses by $0.02, beats on revs https://www.briefing.com/in-depth-analysis/Content/Article?ArticleId=IN20201105162045SRPT

links.title: Briefing.com
links.description: SRPT: Sarepta Therapeutics misses by $0.02, beats on revs (45.15 -6.75) Reports Q3 (Sep) loss of $1.42 per share, excluding non-recurring items, $0.02 worse than the S&P Capital IQ Consensus of ($1.40); revenues rose 45.3% year/year to $143.92 mln vs the $133.69 mln S&P Capital IQ Consensus.

links.title: Briefing.com
links.description: SRPT: Sarepta Therapeutics to commence dosing of next study with commercial process material for SRP-9001 gene therapy program for the treatment of DMD (145.15 -6.75) Sarepta today announced important updates related to the development plan for SRP-9001, the company's investigational gene transfer therapy for the treatment of Duchenne muscular dystrophy.

links.title: Sarepta Therapeutics (SRPT) Reports 3rd Quarter Earnings
links.description: Sarepta Therapeutics (SRPT) reported a 3rd Quarter September 2020 loss of $2.50 per share on revenue of $143.9 million. The consensus estimate was a loss of $1.89 per share on revenue of $131.5 million. Revenue grew 45.3% on a year-over-year basis.
